com.eu.article.web

Class ArticleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eu.article.web.ArticleController

  • @RestController
public class ArticleController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for requests relating to the parsing of Articles. Created by Juan on 29/09/2016.
